TopicTitle: Asymmetric Aircraft with Ferram Aerospace: Can it be done?

Articles.Content:
I had an idea to create a video where I build and fly an asymmetric aircraft, and so I recorded and uploaded it!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/diZRfPEDkiA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

[Craft file (make sure to look at the required mods!)](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/1428)

Enjoy!

-Carlpilot ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
